column2: ggplotly(ggplot(fpl_mean_pos, aes(round, total_points)) + geom_line(aes(col=position)) +theme_calc() + scale_colour_calc() + scale_fill_calc()+ theme_tech(theme="X23andme") + facet_wrap(~ season, ncol = 1) +
labs(title = "Average Points per Round by Position",x = "Round", y="Average Points Per Round"))
